Name: Water Float
LongDescription: Boosts maximum PP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Azurill, Marill, and Azumarill.  You can get a Water Float at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: an Azuri-Dew, an Azuri-Card, and a Fount Charm. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
